field.name: summary
field.value: JQueryValidator generate bad formed javascript for group definitions

field.name: description
field.value:
there was an error in JQueryConfiguration.MergeGroupDefinitionsWithOptions:
it would render groups with a trailing comma, which choke IE and some javascript interpreters:
groups: {Group1:'field1 field2',}
the patch fix: - test case JQueryFormValidationTestCase.GroupValidationUsingScopes - JQueryConfiguration.MergeGroupDefinitionsWithOptions implementation
